header.rec_loc: in the car travelling along the coast of California on holiday
header.topics: The conversation centres around what happens when you no longer wish to see friends and how to deal with this.
header.activity: Car journey discussion between friends about how to phase out friends
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: Italian -- level unspecified; French -- level unspecified
